title: Battlestar Galactica - Escape Velocity.S04E04.edshrinker.AVI
description:
Battlestar Galactica - Escape Velocity.S04E04.edshrinker.avi

I was in the right mood for this one after Alex&#039;s execution on LOST and Cally here last week.  All I can say is, it may be fiction, but these eps cause me an overwhelming desire to pray.

Enjoy Folks!

Notes
This is the third episode of the series that Edward James Olmos has directed. He also directed the Season 1 episode "Tigh Me Up, Tigh Me Down" and the Season 3 episode "Taking a Break from All Your Worries."

Jamie Bamber
Role: Lee "Apollo" Adama

Jamie St. John Bamber Griffith Was born in Hammersmith, London, UK on April 3rd 1973. He grew up both in France and England. His father, Ralph, is a native of Detroit, Michigan. His mother, Elizabeth, is a native of Northern Ireland. Jamie has five brothers and one sister.

Mary McDonnell
Role: Laura Roslin
Mary McDonnell was reknowned for her stage work on the East Coast, working with the Long Wharf Theatre Co., amongst others. It wasn&#039;t until 20 years after working on the theatre stage that she had her break through role in Costner&#039;s "Dances With Wolves."
